00027 class tx_MailformPlusPlus_Dispatcher extends tslib_pibase {
00028         
00035         protected function handleAjax() {
00036                 if(t3lib_extMgm::isLoaded('xajax')) {
00037                         require (t3lib_extMgm::extPath('xajax') . 'class.tx_xajax.php');
00038                         $this->xajax = t3lib_div::makeInstance('tx_xajax');
00039                         #$this->xajax->statusMessagesOn();
00040                         #$this->xajax->debugOn();
00041                         $this->prefixId = "F3_MailformPlusPlus";
00042                         $view = $this->componentManager->getComponent("F3_MailformPlusPlus_View_Default");
00043                         $this->xajax->registerFunction(array($this->prefixId.'_removeUploadedFile', &$view, 'removeUploadedFile'));
00044                         $GLOBALS['TSFE']->additionalHeaderData[$this->prefixId] = $this->xajax->getJavascript(t3lib_extMgm::siteRelPath('xajax'));
00045                         $this->xajax->processRequests();
00046                 }
00047         }
00048         
00056         public function main($content, $setup) {
00057 
00058 
00059                 $this->pi_USER_INT_obj = 1;
00060                 $this->componentManager = F3_GimmeFive_Component_Manager::getInstance();
00061                 
00062                 //handle AJAX stuff
00063                 $this->handleAjax();
00064                 
00065                 //init flexform
00066                 $this->pi_initPIflexForm();
00067                 
00068                 /*
00069                  * set controller:
00070                  * 1. Flexform
00071                  * 2. TypoScript
00072                  * 3. Default controller
00073                  */
00074                 $controller = $this->pi_getFFvalue($this->cObj->data['pi_flexform'], 'controller','sDEF');
00075                 if(!$controller) {
00076                         $controller = $setup['controller'];     
00077                 }
00078                 if(!$controller) {
00079                         $controller = "F3_MailformPlusPlus_Controller_Default";
00080                 }
00081                 $controller = $this->componentManager->getComponent($controller);
00082                 
00083                 /*
00084                  * Parse values from flexform:
00085                  * - Template file
00086                  * - Translation file
00087                  * - Predefined form
00088                  * - E-mail settings
00089                  * - Required fields
00090                  * - Redirect page
00091                  */
00092                 $templateFile = $this->pi_getFFvalue($this->cObj->data['pi_flexform'], 'template_file','sDEF');
00093                 $langFile = $this->pi_getFFvalue($this->cObj->data['pi_flexform'], 'lang_file','sDEF');
00094                 $predef = $this->pi_getFFvalue($this->cObj->data['pi_flexform'], 'predefined','sDEF');
00095                 $emailSettings = $this->parseEmailSettings();
00096                 $redirect = $this->pi_getFFvalue($this->cObj->data['pi_flexform'], 'redirect_page','sMISC');
00097                 $requiredFields = $this->pi_getFFvalue($this->cObj->data['pi_flexform'], 'required_fields','sMISC');
00098                 if(strlen($requiredFields) > 0) {
00099                         $requiredFields = t3lib_div::trimExplode(",",$requiredFields);
00100                         $controller->setRequiredFields($requiredFields);
00101                 }
00102                 if(strlen($redirect) > 0) {
00103                         $controller->setRedirectPage($redirect);
00104                 }
00105                 
00106                 if (isset($content)) {
00107                         $controller->setContent($this->componentManager->getComponent('F3_MailformPlusPlus_Content', $content));
00108                 }
00109                 $controller->setEmailSettings($emailSettings);
00110                 if(strlen($templateFile) > 0) {
00111                         $controller->setTemplateFile($templateFile);
00112                 }
00113                 if(strlen($langFile) > 0) {
00114                         $controller->setLangFile($langFile);
00115                 }
00116                 if(strlen($predef) > 0) {
00117                         $controller->setPredefined($predef);
00118                 }
00119                 return $controller->process();
00120         }
00121         
00127         protected function parseEmailSettings() {
00128                 $emailSettings = array();
00129                 $options = array (
00130                         'email_to' => 'to_email',
00131                         'email_subject' => 'subject',
00132                         'email_sender' => 'sender_email',
00133                         'email_sendername' => 'sender_name',
00134                         'email_replyto' => 'replyto_email',
00135                         'email_replytoname' => 'replyto_name'
00136                 );
00137                 
00138                 //*************************
00139                 //ADMIN settings
00140                 //*************************
00141                 $emailSettings['admin'] = $this->parseEmailSettingsByType('admin',$options);
00142                 
00143                 //*************************
00144                 //USER settings
00145                 //*************************
00146                 $emailSettings['user'] = $this->parseEmailSettingsByType('user',$options);
00147                 
00148                 return $emailSettings;
00149         }
00150         
00158         private function parseEmailSettingsByType($type,$optionsToParse = array()) {
00159                 $typeLower = strtolower($type);
00160                 $typeUpper = strtoupper($type);
00161                 $section = 'sEMAIL'.$typeUpper;
00162                 $emailSettings = array();
00163                 foreach($optionsToParse as $ffname=>$option) {
00164                         if(strcmp($type,'user') == 0) {
00165                                 $ffname .= $type;
00166                         }
00167                         $value = $this->getFFvalue($ffname,$section);
00168                         if(strlen($value) > 0) {
00169                                 $emailSettings[$option] = $value;
00170                         }
00171                 }
00172                 return $emailSettings;
00173         }
00174         
00182         private function getFFvalue($name,$section) {
00183                 $value = $this->pi_getFFvalue($this->cObj->data['pi_flexform'], $name,$section);
00184                 return $value;
00185         }
00186 }
